quote: I'm not an inspirational quote kind of person.
author: Christine Teigen

quote: I think anyone who has a passion for what they love to do, and who pursue it, is inspirational for me.
author: Colin Morgan

quote: All my music is inspirational. You just gotta listen to the words and get what you can get out of it.
author: Young Jeezy

quote: I testify that inspiration can be the spring for every person's hope, guidance, and strength. It is one of the magnified treasures of life. It involves coming to the infinite knowledge of God.
author: James E. Faust

quote: I view art as an inspirational tool.
author: Thomas Kincade

quote: Inspiration is what keeps us well.
author: James Redfield,  The Tenth Insight: Holding the Vision

quote: Inspirational quotes are dances of light that shine in dark places during your life.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: You always draw inspiration from your family or your parents if they've proven to be inspirational. My mother is someone who's always been inspirational to me.
author: Dustin Clare

quote: There's nothing more inspiring than the complexity and beauty of the human heart.
author: Cynthia Hand,  Hallowed

quote: Strong emotions such as passion and bliss are indications that you're connected to Spirit, or 'inspired,' if you will. When you're inspired, you activate dormant forces, and the abundance you seek in any form comes streaming into your life.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Life becomes inspiring, not in spite of the problems and the hard hits, but because of them.
author: Joni Eareckson Tada

quote: I have amazing friends who have led inspirational lives.
author: Andrew Shue

quote: I think of inspiration as desire infused with spirit and topped with an almost reckless optimism.
author: Fred White

quote: Better to be called something positive and inspirational than something negative.
author: Donnie Yen

quote: Inspiration fires you up; motivation keeps you burning.
author: Stuart Aken

quote: Consistent, Timely encouragement has the staggering magnetic power to draw an immortal soul to the God of Hope. The one whose name is Wonderful Counselor.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: There have been many different artists that have been inspirational. I suppose the question is directed to what was the reason why I went into fantasy illustration.
author: Boris Vallejo

quote: Motivation gets you going; Inspiration keeps you going.
author: Todd Stocker,  Refined: Turning Pain Into Purpose

quote: Your inspiration taps hidden reserves of promise that sustain people through times that induce despair. You enable people to envision a future that sustains the best from their past while also holding out new possibilities.
author: Ronald A. Heifetz,  The Practice of Adaptive Leadership: Tools and Tactics for Changing Your Organization and the World

quote: I'm inspired by the people I meet in my travels--hearing their stories, seeing the hardships they overcome, their fundamental optimism and decency. I'm inspired by the love people have for their children. And I'm inspired by my own children, how full they make my heart. They make me want to work to make the world a little bit better. And they make me want to be a better man.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Inspiration comes of working every day.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Had I not come out with an inspirational CD, you perhaps would have never known that I feel like I feel, that all songs, all the music I've ever done is a gift from God.
author: Smokey Robinson

quote: I am very conscious of who I am as an artist and as an inspirational person.
author: R. Kelly

quote: Inspirational leaders need to have a winning mentality in order to inspire respect. It is hard to trust in the leadership of someone who is half-hearted about their purpose, or only sporadic in focus or enthusiasm.
author: Sebastian Coe

quote: I had hoped when my life was chronicled, it would be an inspirational story.
author: Om Puri

quote: I think that the reason for my success is that I am really not aspirational. I am inspirational in that the people at home feel like they can really relate to me.
author: Rosie O'Donnell

quote: It's inspirational to see someone who is dying smile.
author: Arlen Specter

quote: Encouragement is like water to the soul, it makes everything grow.
author: Chris Burkmenn

quote: I've done a lot of albums and I kinda know when I'm onto something that was inspirational for me to record and create, and this was one of those projects where I really enjoyed making the album.
author: Lee Ritenour

quote: Books are challenging and inspirational to me.
author: Amy Sedaris

quote: My inspiration are the woman, friendship, and loneliness.
author: Enrique Iglesias

quote: Inspiration is sometimes as simple as a shared smile.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: I do a lot of inspirational talks for kids, to motivate them to change their lives and give them hope.
author: Adam Beach

quote: Rap music's been around for too long now to be inspirational. The words are, but the music isn't.
author: Alexander McQueen

quote: In life, you need either inspiration or desperation.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: All the effort in the world won't matter if you're not inspired.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Diary

quote: Profound joy of the heart is like a magnet that indicates the path of life.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: So I wanted to sing inspirational music, and that's exactly how I approached it - only the words have been changed to declare my relationship with God.
author: Smokey Robinson

quote: Our moments of inspiration are not lost though we have no particular poem to show for them; for those experiences have left an indelible impression, and we are ever and anon reminded of them.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Always be open to inspiration. You never know where it may come from. Begin with an open mind, end with an inspired heart.
author: Sheri Fink

quote: Your personal life, your professional life, and your creative life are all intertwined. I went through a few very difficult years where I felt like a failure. But it was actually really important for me to go through that. Struggle, for me, is the most inspirational thing in the world at the end of the day - as long as you treat it that way.
author: Skylar Grey

quote: People inspire you, or they drain you. PICK THEM WISELY.
author: Hans F. Hasen

quote: Inspiration is always a surprising visitor.
author: John O'Donohue,  Anam Cara: A Book of Celtic Wisdom

quote: When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Everything that is really great and inspiring is created by the individual who can labor in freedom.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You never know who you're inspiring or uninspiring. People notice more than you think.
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

quote: Iâ€™ve learned that no matter how inspired, fired up and motivated you might be, the dark clouds will always set in
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive,  Your Dreams Will Not Die

quote: Deacon Jones has been the most inspirational person in my football career.
author: Jack Youngblood

quote: Inspiration is external and motivation is internal. It is up to me to provide the switch and you to flip it on!
author: Tricia Cunningham,  The Reverse Diet: Lose 20, 50, 100 Pounds or More by Eating Dinner for Breakfast and Breakfast for Dinner

quote: Stories make us more alive, more human, more courageous, more loving.
author: Madeleine L'Engle
